original_text: Then children were brought to him that he might lay his hands on them and pray. The disciples rebuked the people,
korean_text: 그 때에 사람들이 예수께서 안수하고 기도해 주심을 바라고 어린 아이들을 데리고 오매 제자들이 꾸짖거늘

sentences.original_text: Then children were brought to him
that he might lay his hands on them and pray
